thread.title: When does Animal Crossing's second batch of 'amiibo trading cards' come out? - Gaming
thread.title_full: When does Animal Crossing's second batch of 'amiibo trading cards' come out? - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: When does Animal Crossing's second batch of 'amiibo trading cards' come out? - Gaming
text: You don't have to wait much longer to get your hands on Animal Crossing's second batch of 'amiibo trading cards'.The second wave of the series' card-based amiibo is set to make its European debut on November 20, alongside a nifty album that fans can use to keep track of their cards.Series 2 of the Animal Crossing amiibo cards arrive in stores on 20th November alongside the corresponding album! pic.twitter.com/rRtIzCnVKbâ€” Nintendo UK (@NintendoUK) October 19, 2015The first batch of Animal Crossing amiibo cards was released earlier this month, when Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer came out.The Nintendo 3DS title focuses on the decorating and home-designing aspects of the Animal Crossing games.In-game animals ask players to design houses for them, and it's up to you to meet the animals' requests by furnishing and decorating their homes. By tapping an Animal Crossing series amiibo card to the New Nintendo 3DS XL system or NFC reader/writer accessory, players can also design a room for that specific character on the card and scan additional character cards to invite those characters to visit.New game releases out this month: 10 biggest games of October including Halo, Guitar Hero and Assassin's CreedCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
